attributes.action: Speed camera - A3 kingston bypass into Esher before Claygate Lane Roundabout
attributes.additional_details: I think everyone who lives on The Hinchley Park estate off the kingston bypass would agree with this to be put in place also i think many nearby residents would agree to. Residents on local roads for example Claygate lane, Seven drive and Hinchley Drive.
attributes.background: There is a School on the otherside of the bypass called Hinchley Wood School. My children attend this school and have nearly been run over on many occasions. Drivers fly down this road from the A3 Into Esher at well over 70mph. The speed limit for this road is 40mph.

rejection.details:
Speed cameras in Surrey are the responsibility of Surrey Police. You could contact them with your request for a camera on this road, at https://www.surrey.police.uk/contact-us/

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
